title: Here's What Obama Likes On His Bagel
text:
Here's What Obama Likes On His Bagel He also mourned the closing of a beloved New York City bagel chain. Marina Fang Associate Politics Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 08/31/2015 05:11 PM EDT | Edited: 2 hours ago 
President Barack Obama gave an interview to The Forward, a prominent Jewish publication, and while he fielded questions about important matters like the Iran nuclear deal , he also answered a few essential questions about bagels. 
“I was always a big poppy seed guy,” Obama said, when asked about his favorite bagel flavor. SAUL LOEB via Getty Images 
In terms of toppings, he said he prefers “just a schmear.” He then clarified that he thinks “lox and capers [are] okay, but generally just your basic schmear.” 
In the interview published Monday, Obama also mourned the closing of H & H Bagels , a beloved New York City bagel chain that shuttered its two original locations in 2011 and 2012. He told The Forward that he frequented the store as a student at Columbia University and called its closure “shocking.”
